entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump How about telling AOC to shut her mouth telling America to boycott work. I’m a truck driver for 40 years. I’ve worked thru coronavirus. She really wouldn’t want us truckers to boycott work I don’t think 🤦‍♂️. Thank you sir for your great work you do.
